rukus.text: BOH dopustytʹ tsi khto vvazhayutʹ ta vedutʹ spravedlyve zhyttya u park z techuchymy potokamy. Vony budutʹ prykrashatysya tam z brasletamy zolota, ta perly, ta yikhniy odyah tam bude shovk
Vony keruvalysʹ do harnykh sliv; vony keruvalysʹ u shlyakhu naybilʹshoho Pokhvalenoho

Bezsumnivno, tsey khto disbelieve ta vidbyvayemo inshi z shlyakhu BOHA, ta z Svyashchennykh Masjid shcho my pryznachyly dlya vsikh lyudey - vmiyemo vony urodzhentsi abo vidviduvachi ta prahnutʹ zabrudnyty tse ta pidkupayutʹ tse, my budemo afflict yim z bolisnym retribution
